name: B.F. Sword
description: Gain Attack Damage.

name: Recurve Bow
description: Gain Attack Speed.

name: Needlessly Large Rod
description: Gain Spell Power.

name: Tear of the Goddess
description: Gain Mana.

name: Chain Vest
description: Gain Armor.

name: Negatron Cloak
description: Gain Magic Resist.

name: Giant's Belt
description: Gain Health.

name: Sparring Gloves
description: Gain Critical Strike Chance and Dodge Chance.

name: Spatula
description: It must do something...

name: Deathblade
description: The holder gains 50/75/100 bonus Attack Damage (including components).

name: Giant Slayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do bonus damage. If the target has more health, the bonus damage increases.

name: Hextech Gunblade
description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for 33% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

name: Spear of Shojin
description: The holder's Basic Attacks restore additional Mana.

name: Bloodthirster
description: Physical damage heals the holder for a percentage of the damage dealt.

name: Zeke's Herald
description: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hexes in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

name: Infinity Edge
description: Grants Critical Strike Chance (including components). Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: Rapid Firecannon
description: Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components). The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

name: Statikk Shiv
description: The holder gains 15% bonus Attack Speed. Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 70 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Titan's Resolve
description: When the holder attacks or takes damage, they gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power. This stacks up to 25 times, at which point the holder gains 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Runaan's Hurricane
description: The holder gains 15 bonus Attack Damage. The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 75% of the wearer's Attack Damage as physical damage.

name: Zz'Rot Portal
description: At the start of combat, the holder taunts nearby enemies. When the holder dies, a Voidspawn arises taunting nearby enemies. Voidspawns that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

name: Challenger Emblem
description: The holder gains the Challenger trait.

name: Last Whisper
description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced for several seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Rabadon's Deathcap
description: Grants a percentage bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: Archangel's Staff
description: During combat, the holder gains 25 Ability Power every 4 seconds.

name: Locket of the Iron Solari
description: When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.

name: Ionic Spark
description: Enemies within 3 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50%. When they cast an Ability, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 250% of their max Mana.

name: Morellonomicon
description: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.

name: Arcanist Emblem
description: The holder gains the Spellweaver trait.

name: Jeweled Gauntlet
description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: Blue Buff
description: After casting their Ability, the holder gains Mana.

name: Frozen Heart
description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemies.

name: Chalice of Power
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Spell Power for the rest of combat.

name: Redemption
description: Periodically, the holder radiates an aura to nearby allies, healing them a percentage of their missing Health. Affected allies take reduced damage from multi-target abilities and attacks for several seconds.

name: Hand Of Justice
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder's basic attacks and spells deal additional damage or heal for a percentage of damage dealt.

name: Bramble Vest
description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal magic damage to all nearby enemies every couple seconds.

name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
description: The holder gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

name: Sunfire Cape
description: Periodically, a random nearby enemy is burned a percentage of their maximum Health over several seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced.

name: Bodyguard Emblem
description: The holder gains the Bodyguard trait.

name: Shroud of Stillness
description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.

name: Dragon's Claw
description: Grants 200 bonus Magic Resist (including components). On being hit by magic or true damage from an Ability, launch a fireball at the Ability's caster that deals magic damage equal to 18% of their max Health (0.5 second cooldown).

name: Zephyr
description: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

name: Syndicate Emblem
description: The holder gains the Syndicate trait.

name: Quicksilver
description: The holder gains 20% bonus Attack Speed. The holder is immune to crowd control in combat for 15 seconds.

name: Debonair Emblem
description: The holder gains the Debonair trait.

name: Striker Emblem
description: The holder gains the Striker trait.

name: Hextech Emblem
description: The holder gains the Hextech trait.

name: Warmog's Armor
description: Grants bonus Health (including components).

name: Chemtech Emblem
description: The holder gains the Chemtech trait.

name: Banshee's Claw
description: When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.

name: Tactician's Crown
description: The holder's maximum team size is increased.

name: Assassin Emblem
description: The holder gains the Assassin trait.

name: Edge of Knight
description: When the holder first drops below 50% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding negative effects. After coming out of stealth, the holder gains an additional 40% bonus Attack Speed.

name: Thief's Gloves
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary items. Temporary items increase in power based on your player level.

name: Luminous Deathblade
description: Contributing to a kill grants the holder additional Attack Damage for the rest of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

name: Demonslayer
description: The holder's Abilities and attacks do bonus damage. If the target has more health, the bonus damage increases.

name: Hextech Lifeblade
description: The holder's magic and true damage from Abilities heal them for a percentage of the damage dealt. Excess healing fuels a shield that protects the holder.

name: Spear of Hirana
description: The holder's Basic Attacks restore additional Mana.

name: Guardian Archangel
description: Prevents the holder's first death, placing them in stasis instead. After a short delay, they return with restored Health and shed all negative effects.

name: Blessed Bloodthirster
description:
Damage heals the holder for 35% of the damage dealt. Once per combat at 40% Health, gain a 35% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

 Radiant Bonus: +20 Attack Damage

name: Zeke's Harmony
description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain Attack Speed and Lifesteal for the rest of combat.

name: Zenith Edge
description: Grants Critical Strike Chance (including components) and Critical Strike damage. Each point of Critical Strike Chance above 100% becomes bonus Critical Strike Damage.

name: Rapid Lightcannon
description: Increases the holder's Attack Range and grants bonus Attack Speed (including components). The holder's attacks can no longer miss.

name: Guinsoo's Reckoning
description: Attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. This bonus Attack Speed can stack any number of times.

name: Statikk Favor
description: Every third attack from the holder unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist for several seconds.

name: Titan's Vow
description: When the holder takes damage or inflicts a critical strike, they gain a stacking Attack Damage and Ability Power bonus.  This stacks up to a limit, at which point the holder gains Armor and Magic Resistance.

name: Runaan's Tempest
description: The holder's attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing a percentage of the holder's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects. These bolts can critically strike.

name: Zz'Rot Invitation
description: At the start of combat, a Radiant Voidmother with bonus Health and Attack Damage aries and taunts nearby enemies. Radiant Voidmothers that arise from summoned units are only partially effective.

name: Eternal Whisper
description: When the holder inflicts a critical hit, the target's Armor is reduced for several seconds. This effect does not stack.

name: Rabadon's Ascended Deathcap
description: Grants bonus Ability Power (including components).

name: Urf-Angel's Staff
description: In combat, gain 30 Ability Power every 4 seconds. +20 Ability Power.

name: Locket of the Targon Prime
description: When combat begins, the holder and nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks damage for several seconds.

name: Covalent Spark
description: Nearby enemies have their Magic Resist reduced (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to a percentage of their max Mana.
radiantBonus: Regenerate percentage max Health per second

description: When the holder deals magic or true damage with their Ability, they burn the target, dealing a percentage of the target's maximum Health as true damage over several seconds, and reducing healing for the duration of the burn.

description: The holder's magic and true damage from their Ability can critically strike. The holder gains bonus Critical Strike Damage.

description: The holder gains Armor and Magic Resist for each enemy targeting them.

description: When combat begins, the holder shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana until they cast.

description: When combat begins, the holder summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for several seconds. Ignores CC immunity.

name: Quickestsilver

name: Warmog's Pride

description: When combat begins, the holder and all nearby allies in the same row gain a shield that blocks the first enemy Ability.
radiantBonus: Health for all allies at the start of combat

name: Rascal's Gloves
description: At the beginning of each planning phase, the holder equips 2 temporary Radiant items. [Consumes Three Item Slots]

name: Lagoon Emblem
description: The holder gains the Lagoon trait.

name: Darkflight Emblem
description: The holder gains the Darkflight trait.

name: Scalescorn Emblem
description: The holder gains the Scalescorn trait.

name: Cannoneer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Cannoneer trait.

name: Shimmerscale Emblem
description: The holder gains the Shimmerscale trait.

name: Bruiser Emblem
description: The holder gains the Bruiser trait.

name: Cavalier Emblem
description: The holder gains the Cavalier trait.

name: Warrior Emblem
description: The holder gains the Warrior trait.

name: Tempest Emblem
description: The holder gains the Tempest trait.

description: The holder gains the Mage trait.

name: Mystic Emblem
description: The holder gains the Mystic trait.

name: Swiftshot Emblem
description: The holder gains the Swiftshot trait.

name: Mirage Emblem
description: The holder gains the Mirage trait.

name: Ragewing Emblem
description: The holder gains the Ragewing trait.

name: Evoker Emblem
description: The holder gains the Evoker trait.

name: Guild Emblem
description: The holder gains the Guild trait.

name: Guardian Emblem
description: The holder gains the Guardian trait.

name: Jade Emblem
description: The holder gains the Jade trait.

name: Assassin Emblem
description: The holder gains the Assassin trait.

name: Dragonmancer Emblem
description: The holder gains the Dragonmancer trait.

name: Dragon Blessing
description: Use on a Dragonmancer to make them your Dragonmancer hero. Cannot be used in combat.

name: Mogul's Mail
description: Grant 1.5 Armor, 1.5 Magic Resist, and 15 Health when taking damage, stacking up to 30 times. At full stacks, grant 2 gold.

name: Draven's Axe
description: Gain 1 Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 80 gold). Attacks grant 1 stack, up to 100 times. At full stacks, grant 7 gold and 1 item component(s).

name: Needlessly Big Gem
description: Once per combat: If the holder is alive after 15 seconds of combat, grant 1 gold per 2 living allies, and each living ally deals 1% more damage per gold in your bank (up to 80 gold).

name: Goldmancer's Staff
description: Grant 1 Ability Power per gold in your bank (up to 80 gold) and a chance to drop 2 gold on enemy kill.

name: Gambler's Blade
description: Gain 1% bonus Attack Speed per gold in your bank (up to 80). Each attack has a 6% chance to drop 1 gold.

name: Determined Investor
description: After dying during combat 7 times, this item is destroyed. Upon destruction, grant the item Diamond Hands, 1 Champion Duplicator, and 15 gold.

name: Diamond Hands
description: Once per combat: At 66% Health and 33% Health, become invulnerable for 2 seconds and grant 1 gold.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: +300 Health. Refreshing your Shop adds a stack to Philosopher's Stone. Each Shop refresh has a chance to copy the holder and consume all stacks. More expensive champions are harder to copy.

name: Crown of Champions
description: Every 4 seconds, the next attack deals 9001x the amount of gold in your bank in true damage.

name: Darkflight Essence
description: When the holder dies, grant this item's stats to each Darkflight champion.    Acquired from copying a non-craftable item via the Darkflight trait.

name: Anima Visage
description: The wearer regenerates a percentage of their maximum Health each second.

name: Death's Defiance
description: A percentage of the damage the wearer receives is instead dealt over time as non-lethal damage.

name: Eternal Winter
description: Enemies who damage the wearer have their Attack Speed slowed for several seconds. After being slowed this way a certain number of times, the attacker is Frozen for the duration instead. An enemy can only be Frozen once every several seconds.

name: Infinity Force
description: Increase all stats.

name: Manazane
description: After the wearer casts their spell for the first time each combat, they restore Mana over several seconds.

name: Obsidian Cleaver
description: The wearer's attacks and spell damage shred enemy Armor and Magic Resistance by 40% for several seconds.

name: Randuin's Sanctum
description: At the start of combat, all allies adjacent to the wearer gain bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the rest of combat.

name: Rocket-Propelled Fist
description: At the start of combat, the wearer pulls the farthest enemy into melee range, stunning them for several seconds. Allies within range will prioritize attacking that enemy.

name: Gold Collector
description: The wearer executes enemies below a percentage of health on hit. Executions generate 1 gold.

name: Zhonya's Paradox
description: The first instance of damage that would reduce the wearer below a percentage of their Health is prevented, causing them to become invulnerable for several seconds.
